properties.title: Maximum air temperature (12 h) observations from weather station Juvvasshøe, INNLANDET, Norge, (WIGOS ID: 0-20000-0-01362, station ID: 15270).
keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC TEMPERATURE > SURFACE TEMPERATURE > AIR TEMPERATURE
GCMDPROV: Government Agencies-non-US > Norway > NO/MET > Norwegian Meteorological Institute
properties.summary: Time series of Maximum air temperature (12 h) observations from the Norwegian weather station Juvvasshøe (WIGOS ID 0-20000-0-01362, station ID 15270). The observations have been through the data collection system of the Norwegian Meteorological institute which includes a number of automated and manual quality control routines. The number of available quality control routines is element dependent.
